website_summaries.verdict: This trusted odor eliminator is affordable and works for just about any cleaning or odor-eliminating job you can think of.
pros: Removes odors and sanitizes by killing 99.9% of germs
Can be used as everyday cleaning solution
Can be sprayed directly onto carpets, furniture, curtains, pet bedding, litter boxes, etc
Includes one gallon OdoBan concentrate plus spray bottle for hassle-free use
Highly concentrated, so a little goes a long way
cons: Some find the initial smell a little overpowering, but it tends to dissipate

customer_reviews.title: Can't Live Without Odoban!
customer_reviews.text: I've used OdoBan for at least 15 years & I couldn't live without it. I use it in my laundry in the final rinse to disinfect & deodorize. I clean the exterior of my toilet, the toilet seat, kitchen counters & mop my floors with it. I use the diluted spray to disinfect all surfaces in my home. I'm very fond of the Original Scent. However, the reduced price of the Melon Cucumber Scent influenced my decision to try this. For those who desire a softer, less pronounced scent I suggest you try this one.
customer_reviews.author: LynneTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Better than the other leading brand
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. It can really take out any smells. I rented a house that smelled of cigarrettes and I could not sleep at night because of the smell. I washed the walls, the floor, the ceiling and the smell was gone and I was able to stay there for the rest of my rental period. Fabreeze doesn't even come close to this. I can even use it in the laundry.
customer_reviews.author: F. Roman

customer_reviews.title: Performance and smell
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited when I finally received this order. I opened and read instructions and carefully sprayed a small area. After a few minutes, I realized I could not stand the smell. After an hour, I was getting a headache. I finally got out the carpet cleaner and shampooed the area that I had sprayed. Odor ban might work for some, but not me!
customer_reviews.author: B. Reiter

customer_reviews.title: Helpful for pet odors!
customer_reviews.text: My son, who is a martial artist and personal trainer recommended this product to me after he used it in one of the gyms he trains in. I used it in an area where my cats were spraying in the basement. Nothing would help, but this actually made a difference.
customer_reviews.author: CF

customer_reviews.title: Best Odor Remediation Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have two lab dogs and after years and years of traditional carpet cleaner, vinegar, Nature’s Miracle, professional carpet cleaning etc. nothing has worked like OdoBan! The only room in our house that has carpet is the family room where our dogs spend most of their time and where our puppy has been excluded to so we can monitor her. The previous stuff smelled great at first but always ended up smelling like perfume over a wet dog smell, the perfume smell eventually fading back into a dog smell with routine vacuuming, and monthly carpet cleaning. Walking into our home now, I’m not embarrassed by how “doggy” it smells. OdoBan truly got RID of the smell. Thank you OdoBan!!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Does not smell like eucalyptus.
customer_reviews.text: This removes odors EXCELLENTLY, but I gave it 3 stars because of the smell. This is not a eicalyptus smell this is a bad floral small and it is strong. I do not enjoy the smell at all, but I enjoy the odor removing power. I will try another scent next time. Do not get the eucalyptus!
customer_reviews.author: Kiirstin

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for my problem
customer_reviews.text: Used it in a second hand cabinet after it had been installed. No idea what the odor is and it's the only cabinet (one of 12) that has the odor. Doesn't smell like rodent or roaches, but it's really, really bad. Soaked the wood twice (veneer is warping off now) with not even a little improvement. Will keep the product, use elsewhere as needed, hoping it's more effective with less challenging odors. Have to dismantle that section of counter, remove it and replace with a store bought cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: L. Simrell

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Great deodorizer!
customer_reviews.text: Great deodorizer for a kennel situation. Use just a small amount as it's rather concentrated. Using it for kitchen chores (wastebasket), laundry (run it through a laundry cycle to freshen your washer), floors, commodes, dog bedding, and any other place where odors abound. A little bit goes a long, long way...
customer_reviews.author: M. Elaine Summerhill

customer_reviews.title: It works for pet odors!
customer_reviews.text: I have potty trained two dogs in a new house and was getting ready to rip up my carpet and change it...until I found this! The best way I’ve figured out to use it is: shampoo carpet with this and hot water then I go over the carpet with the spray while it’s wet! I leave the spray on the carpet!
customer_reviews.author: TERRI Ann

customer_reviews.title: Allergic
customer_reviews.text: Half of my family was allergic to this. Myself included. It did not get out the odor in my carpet even though I tried both the spray and then the concentrate via my steam cleaner. House smelled for days, it was awful.
customer_reviews.author: 2Loves

customer_reviews.title: This is not eucalyptus
customer_reviews.text: The bottle says original eucalyptus scent. I haven't opened it, but since it came to me with a cracked lid, I can already tell that it is NOT eucalyptus. It smells like flowers...concentrated flowers which I'm allergic to. I needed this for a housing inspection tomorrow and now I can't use it because just having it in my house is messing me up. There's no way I can clean with it.
customer_reviews.author: Danisty

customer_reviews.title: WORKS WONDERS!
customer_reviews.text: WORKS WONDERS! I have 2 dogs and 5 cats, needless to say accidents happen. A couple of my cats took to peeing on the carpet. After the 1st use of odoban my house smelled fresh and clean. I had company and they could not even tell I have animals. This product has many uses and is not over powering. I do not see myself using anything else now.
customer_reviews.author: Aly

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Make 32 Gallons of Normal OdoBan!
customer_reviews.text: OdoBan itself is a great product but ... The "concentrate" doesn't really make 32 gallons. Instructions say to mix 1 QUART of concentrate with three quarts of water for normal use. That means it really makes only 4 gallons of regular OdoBan.
customer_reviews.author: GCMSGuru

customer_reviews.title: Great product no long lasting scent either like other reviews claim
customer_reviews.text: A lot of people are complainimg the smell doesn't go away...sorry but you're wrong. I had dried pee poop & vomit spots from an ill kitty...wet them dabbled w dry towel saturated with this spray used fingers to work into carpet then let air dry didn't even dab up as directions say to do...strong scent from spray was a bit tough for a few days but weather was nice so had windows opened & it faded fairly quickly with time. Have new cat and she doesn't attempt to remark the spots. I'm happy. No cat pee smell (it was my bedroom closet so hapoy this worked so my clithes don't reek of cat pee smell)!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Coulter

customer_reviews.title: 4 starts because the product is great. Although it came packaged just fine with no ...
customer_reviews.text: 4 starts because the product is great. Although it came packaged just fine with no damage to the box, the spray bottle was crack and missing a piece on the top of the handle. I didn't think this was a big deal because it still worked and I am not using it to decorate my home. Today, it fell apart on me while I was using it. Now I have to go out and buy a spray bottle. What bothers me is that someone put this in the box and mailed it to me with a piece missing on the handle... it wasn't in the box so I know that's not where it broke.
customer_reviews.author: J. Scott

customer_reviews.title: This is my all time favorite cleaning product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love using in to sanitize my laundry, especially smelly dish cloths & towels that sour. I use it to sanitize bathrooms and clean hard surfaces & it's amazing to spray in showers to kill bacteria & mold and then on top of that you can spray it on Bedding, upholstery, rugs and other surfaces to eliminate odors not just mask them! It kills 99.9% of bacteria & viruses too! I love this stuff so very much! It smells good and is safe on top of it all!!! I hope they never quit making it!!...Janette
customer_reviews.author: Lee Niel Allen

customer_reviews.title: good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I never had used this product before (mostly because I couldn't find it in stores)...so I ordered it after I had read a lot of reviews about how good it was. I have to agree that it sure has helped clean up after my dogs. They are old and have some accidents every once in awhile. Nice order to this original scent and is easy to use. I'm glad I have it.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary1001

customer_reviews.title: This spray is awesome for eliminating that odor
customer_reviews.text: I live in a trailer and sometimes when it gets to a certain level the black water tank gets a little smelly. This spray is awesome for eliminating that odor! I also spray the dog beds with it and while it makes everything smell fresh, it does not compete with my scented candles!
customer_reviews.author: sweetthing

customer_reviews.title: Better then Fabreeze and Bleach hands down
customer_reviews.text: I love Odoban. I have pets and I use it as an air spray, a mop bucket additive, in my carpet cleaner and as a cleaning spray. Better then bleach. Vet turned me onto it when I got parvovirus in my home. This is what they use after a parvo pup. That says something for how well it kills germs in my opinion. Much better scent then bleach. I have kept this in stock in my house for the better part of 5 years and haven’t found anything I can’t use it on. (Works and smells better then Fabreeze)
customer_reviews.author: Kenni

customer_reviews.title: Solved our mold problem
customer_reviews.text: This works! We had to pull up two rooms of older carpet which left deteriorated padding stuck to the cement slab. There was also a moldy or mildewy smell in the house due to the carpet problem. The OdoBan concentrate mixed into warm water mopped onto the floor to sit a few minutes and then mopped around and shop-vac'd up did the trick. The floor was left clean and fresh-smelling.
customer_reviews.author: iamme

customer_reviews.title: Smells real, not like a cover up. Very good
customer_reviews.text: Smells great. Works well. Subtle. Prefer the eucalyptus over lavender, but that's nice too. Good for smokers & pet owners. Will be a lifetime user.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Deitz

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding product that does what is advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent odor eliminator. I have used this for quite some time and was pleased to find it available on Amazon. This refreshes laundry while ridding odors from common causes around the home. It also kills bacteria. I never want to be without it.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy in Ohio

customer_reviews.title: Best cleaning products
customer_reviews.text: Legit works, I use it often in my parents house who smoke, cleaned a smoke stained hardwood floor, safe enough to pull black stains out from smoke and dirt but safe enough to save the floors where the varnish and color still existed, I have purchased this product multiple times since my initial purchase A++++
customer_reviews.author: John E. Corley

customer_reviews.title: Very strong scent
customer_reviews.text: After the application, the scent of the odor eliminator was very strong. I used this on my daughters carpet and did not let her sleep in the room for 2 days. I initially steamed the carpet, then sprayed it sparingly to eliminate the odor. After the 2 days I feel it worked well as there is not a "foot" smell in my daughters room anymore. She is 7, we keep shoes outside, and had the carpets professionally cleaned 10 months ago.
customer_reviews.author: Christine B.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I already knew I LOVED the ready to use version of this product. It is the best air and fabric odor remover yet. I decided to also try the concentrated option as a laundry sanitizer. This stuff is great, as a cup of it on the last rinse cycle and it leaves clothing smelling great. I am a dog groomer, and this takes the dog stink from my towels. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Staci Galey

customer_reviews.title: Works great, pet friendly
customer_reviews.text: I love odoban and go through it so quick I was really excited to find it in a big jug. We have a house full of dogs and cats so I can’t use regular disinfectant sprays like Lysol but this smells a million times better anyway and as far as I can tell from researching is completely pet friendly. I use this just about daily on the couch and recliner as well as on our mattresses now and then. I love having pets but don’t need our house to smell like them and this stuff cleans and freshens everything great without harming our fur babies.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Best kept secret!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had known about this product years ago. It does get the cat urine smell out. I have not tried the other scents offered, however, I can live with the Eucalyptus Scent because the cat odor disappears. This is why it got a 3 star on smell from me because it is not my favorite scent but it doesn't last long. So both smells disappear quickly. My friend told me about it and she uses it for everything. Pet odors, laundry and general cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: mm

customer_reviews.title: I clean house and this product does it all. ...
customer_reviews.text: I clean house and this product does it all. Ive given this as a gift to my mom and ive gotten others to order it.. This really works well on cigerette and animal odors.. This is a do all product and i will forever be using this.The sent smells so fresh and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie L.

customer_reviews.title: Not a hospital cleanser smell, but wet
customer_reviews.text: Product is great for refreshing stale areas (the cleaning company uses it where I work). It CANNOT be used on your pet but on their skunky pillows it does a really decent job. Product was a little wet when it arrived (don't know if it leaked or not) and doesn't atomize quite as much as I'd like, but I can always put it in a different container.
customer_reviews.author: jswank

customer_reviews.title: Great solution for pet odor in carpet
customer_reviews.text: This product was recommended to me to fight dog odor in carpet. I have to say I was surprised at just how well it worked. I ended up using about half of the spray bottle (which comes full in addition to the refill bottle) to treat a large bedroom and stair landing (about 200 square feet) so it was a lot of product to address the problem but it really did a good job. The instructions say to use enough that the carpet is damp for 10 minutes. All in all, I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: John A.

customer_reviews.title: It Works Exactly As Advertized !
customer_reviews.text: I bought OdoBan for a friend a few months ago and let me just say she loved it. So,I found it here on Amazon and purchased some for myself. Seriously amazing product. I'll buy it again ! Fast delivery, it came before the projected time and I love the accompanying spray bottle which came with it. This product will save you Money and Time plus it has different scents to choose from it smells clean and fresh ! I'm using it everywhere including the washing machine kills pet odors and socks never smelled so good ! I Love OdoBan !!! Love It...!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I live with animals
customer_reviews.text: Yes, I live with my 2 cats and 3 opossums. My upstairs landlord, aka “Dad”, has a super sniffer. He always lets me know if he detects odor. After moping and spritzing with this stuff, I don’t have to hear these complaints. The smell is fresh, not like bleach or perfume. Just fresh
customer_reviews.author: SA Today

customer_reviews.title: Bottle leaks but still love it
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing for pet odor and just stale smelling stuff it will just take it away doesn’t really smell like Eucalyptus but it does take the order away so I’m happy with that. The bottle leaks but still love the product
customer_reviews.author: Jules78

customer_reviews.title: This product is a great product. Definitely on my subscription orders.
customer_reviews.text: This product is a great all-in-one cleaner. I use it to mop the basement floor and shampoo the living room carpet. The spray bottle is nice for spot cleaning and general upkeep on some surfaces. I love the scent this product has. It’s not too strong and doesn’t smell like harsh chemicals. It’s my bleach smell. I know it’s been a cleaning day when I walk in to this familiar odor. No odor is left behind from before the cleaning. Product can be a bit pricey, but the value of the product is worth it. FYI, we have 4 dogs in the household so sometimes pet odors can be strong.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Viola

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product easy to use eliminates odors
customer_reviews.text: I love the eucalyptus scent of this product. It has superior odor elimination. I have 7 dogs and several cats that live in the house usually and this product almost eliminates all of the smell of the animals. I also have an elderly mother in law living with us now and she also has Incontinence problems so it also eliminates or odors from the house.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This product is THE best for neutralizing pet orders. I specifically wanted a product that would cover-up odor of dog urine on my stone patio, for those in-between times when I don't have time to hose down. My friend recommended this product after she had an invasion of skunks nesting in her roof. Oh! And don't forget to spray your air/heat filters to freshen the house.
customer_reviews.author: STS

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this brand for many years. When I run out, I try other brands but there's nothing like this brand. It does the job every time, has a very pleasant smell and cuts through odors well. I fill other spray bottles and have one in every bathroom as well as the kitchen and laundry room. Terrific brand; am very happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: hula maiden

customer_reviews.title: Great disinfectant
customer_reviews.text: Been using OdoBan for years. Glad to see Amazon has it, now. Also recently found other scents I wanna try. The giant refills are a nice bonus, too. Bulk disinfectant to satisfy my OCD.
customer_reviews.author: G.S. Fordham

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for years. I use to get it from Sam's Club but was happy to find it here. Read the label . It is great for whatever it says it is. Love the disinfectant and that hospitals use it in there surgery rooms. It is great for laundry and pet odors. Wonderful product!! I will not be without it! Price is good. Love it in my kitchen. Great for wiping counter tops after processing raw meats. Floors are so clean after giving them a once over with Odor Ban. A little goes a long way. Try it and you will never want to be without it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I don’t care for the smell (it’s like a puff of baby powder), and I thought this was a natural product but it’s LOADED with chemicals. I’m disappointed I spent the money on it.
customer_reviews.author: NLloyd82

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: Don't tend to get too excited over disinfectants and air fresheners, but this product warrants a review. Just placed my second order. I've two cats and this handles all our problems. The smell is not over powering, but pleasant, and it has removed every stain I've aimed it at in the past couple of years. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ibanamazonfan

customer_reviews.title: Does a wonderful job of totally getting doggie odor out of blankets
customer_reviews.text: Does a wonderful job of totally getting doggie odor out of blankets. I also mop the floors with it for a fresh smelling house. First product ive found that really does a good job getting rid of cat pee smell as well.
customer_reviews.author: D. Wallner

customer_reviews.title: Best Odor Remover Ever Used
customer_reviews.text: Omg, I don't know this this stuff works, but it does! I have pets that sometimes have accidents in the house, so my friend told me about it, I was hesitant but went ahead and ordered it and it's the best odor remover I have ever tried because it actually gets RID of the odor, I don't know how but it does and that is all that matters to me, and I love the eucalyptus scent! Would definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Terri Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Works really well
customer_reviews.text: This product is excellent. Removes pet odors indoors and outdoors. I use it on cloth materials in the house and on the concrete in the backyard. Leaves everything smelling good.
customer_reviews.author: sheryl n.

customer_reviews.title: Great clean up
customer_reviews.text: Sick and aging dogs left my life full of necessary cleanups on carpets, wood floors, and the occasional kitchen floor. This product improved the experience leaving a fresh clean smell lasting over time. I would buy again if I had need.
customer_reviews.author: bjb

customer_reviews.title: A must have for a fresh clean home.
customer_reviews.text: First used this after a house fire. It worked so well that I continue to use it now. I clean my floors and sometimes add a little to the wash as well. Wash all pet beds and blankets with this to remove odors. I love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lucky Grandpa

customer_reviews.title: Out, out darn skunk!
customer_reviews.text: I used this along with my other bottle of scent destroyer. This does have a clean scent to it and I noticed people using this product in ways I had not thought of. Freshing up chair cushions for instant.
customer_reviews.author: Spatzie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This product is AMAZING!! It has an amazing scent it eliminated odors as soon as I started spraying it. Price is Amazing.. you can use this product for more than one purpose I am in shock at all of the ways you can use it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: 2010-2020 still works for me
customer_reviews.text: Best cleaning, sanitizing air freshening stuff you can buy. There's probably some really great competitors, but I have grown accustom to the eucalyptus scent and to me its just the smell of guaranteed clean sanitized surfaces or areas.... Smells good in here what's that minty smell??????
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Hearn Jr

customer_reviews.title: Literally THE best I’ve ever found for pet and smoke odors!
customer_reviews.text: Literally THE Best!!! Great fresh scent. No “Lysol” type scent. Instantly removes smoke odors and doesn’t leave a lingering scent (which I’m prone to headaches from). Old urine stains cleaned better than ever using this! I also used in laundry. So many uses.
customer_reviews.author: Alegna M.

customer_reviews.title: Clean Fresh Home with Odoban Alone
customer_reviews.text: The stuff is fab, making the whole house to have the aroma of brand new. A very effective product which demands it's use in the car. It's a wonder ever doing without it, very sure to keep it on hand. Odoban is something to rave about, with a subltle perfume, that brings out the best of home.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Every bit as good as poopourie.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Very effective. I work in people's homes when nature calls and I have to use their restroom I can do my business without any worries about rendering the space uninhabitable.
customer_reviews.author: john mullinax

customer_reviews.title: 🌼 Strong AF. Best odor remover I've used
customer_reviews.text: OdoBan is the best stuff I've used from laundry to disinfecting to freshening the furniture. Even though the product has no harsh chemicals, don't get yourself locked in a small room while spraying. Those sensitive to odors may want to spray and wait a bit before entering a room. If you really want to clean your 💩 up... Get some of this.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Guard

customer_reviews.title: Gets rid of almost any odor
customer_reviews.text: All pet owners and professional cleaners should have this on hand. It's the list effective odor eliminator I've ever used. I've used it for litter box misses and for cleaning a home that reeked of cigarettes. It's highly effective.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Smells like a diaper pale
customer_reviews.text: I do NOT like the smell! I have never smelled eucalyptus that smells like a diaper pale. Hoping I can return it
customer_reviews.author: Shanna House

customer_reviews.title: My favorite cleaner deodorizer
customer_reviews.text: I use to have to drive to Home Depot for this. I love this scent and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Karla Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a fan of the scent in the bottle. If you set the bottle out, let's say to gather your laundry...you will wonder "what is that strong chemical smell?". However, when using it in the laundry, it takes out all the odors and doesn't leave its weird scent either.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Grant

customer_reviews.title: Takes out pee smell
customer_reviews.text: No pet pee odor. Cat pees in corners on my new hardwood floors. I have taken a UV light to spots cleaned with the product and no urine remains. The smell is a little chemical but goes away quickly. Next time I will try the citrus scent. I like the way it can be diluted.
customer_reviews.author: Okie girl

customer_reviews.title: Knocks out odors like a champ!
customer_reviews.text: This is great stuff, better than Febreeze by a mile. The eucalyptus scent smells a little bit “mediciny”, for lack of a better word, BUT it knocks out bad doors like a champ. I’ve used it especially on my dog’s multiple beds around the house, she can stink up a bed like no other!
customer_reviews.author: JAMES MCKELLAR

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Great value. smells great takes away odors. this is way better that fabrezz. great to clean with as well
customer_reviews.author: Lioness

customer_reviews.title: Great pet odor remover!
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff for cleaning for pet odor issues! There is nothing better out there!
customer_reviews.author: Artic777AK

customer_reviews.title: Great all around cleaning disinfectant.
customer_reviews.text: My sister told me about this product. I love the fresh eucalyptus scent and I am using it for everything from messy spills, to disinfecting, to cleaning up pet messes on carpet. The value is terrific for the amount I got for the price. The concentrate will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Rasmussen

customer_reviews.title: I will recommend it to anyone who needs to get rid of ...
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several things to get the smell out. home remedies, urine out, shampoos for carpet. I used this one time and it worked the first time. I will recommend it to anyone who needs to get rid of odors.
customer_reviews.author: Grubworm

customer_reviews.title: I love way my house smell after each use
customer_reviews.text: I have two dogs. I use this product as a deodorizer and germ eliminator. I love way my house smell after each use. I use the smaller spray bottle for quick touch ups.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Odor Control& Can Put in a TinySprayer
customer_reviews.text: Love effectiveness of odor control. You could have another scent to pick up smokers. Also, include one small spray bottle & sell others in a separate package. Great to carry one in your pocket or purse.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Elizabeth Gibbons, PhD, on CTLTD from NSU

customer_reviews.title: Not a pleasant smell but works
customer_reviews.text: It covers up the smell of dog urine but I don't like the scent. It's much better than dog urine but it's kind of plastic-y and chemically smelling.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: This is the BEST odor eliminator I've ever seen
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST odor eliminator I've ever seen. I used to work at a kids' pizza chain in high school and we used it for the bathrooms, if that tells you anything. I recently rediscovered it at my local house cleaning supply store and was so excited to use it on our basement. We have two dogs that have decided that the basement is a second yard & I've tried everything to get the smell out. This stuff works. You have to give it some time to let the "odoban smell" evaporate, then you are left with just a fresh, clean smell that is beautiful! I am beyond pleased with this product...it gave me back my basement!
customer_reviews.author: noworries

customer_reviews.title: Odo Ban
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for many years-it is simply the best. At one time I had a B&B and my guests always raved about how clean their room was and the very pleasant scent. Darlene B.Ford, Granbury,TX
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: We had tried everything to get rid of the urine smell from out cat’s accidents. NOTHING worked, until OdoBan. We couldn’t believe how quickly the smell was gone. After just one use. We will always keep a bottle in our house.
customer_reviews.author: Susan R. Gatewood

customer_reviews.title: best odor spray
customer_reviews.text: this is my go to for floor cleaner, air freshener, carpet cleaning, disinfecting... ect Nothing works as well. I have older dogs one of which decided he wants to mark things and this takes the smell away.
customer_reviews.author: dawn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Love it for cats and dogs. It freshens any fabric or carpet. Did not have to replace the carpet.
customer_reviews.author: NodakFan4Life

customer_reviews.title: great for eliminating smoke odors due to fire
customer_reviews.text: I used this product to try to get rid of the smoke smell in my Kilim rug due to an extensive fire that destroyed our home. This product is awesome! The smoky smell is completely gone. I have also used it on some clothing that was professionally dry cleaned by a firm that specialized in fire restoration. Unfortunately, the clothing retained the smoky smell until I treated them with Odoban. NOW, the smoky smell is completely gone! I love Odoban---it's great!
customer_reviews.author: audrey garabadian

customer_reviews.title: Cheap sprayer
customer_reviews.text: Come on, sprayer just broke after ten sprays, cheapest product I ever used. Made in USA. What a shame.
customer_reviews.author: Wilson W.

customer_reviews.title: Great scent
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't eliminate odors permanently but has a nice scent. I still use it all the time but doesn't prevent pets from staining same place and odor returns after a short time. Maybe, less odor.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Odoban works but always use gloves!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for getting rid of the odor. Especially urine - pets or children. OdoBan does exactly what it says it does. So for that it gets five stars. However... *Warning* you must read the label before handling the product. always use gloves. Never let it touch your skin. Keep away from pets. I think there should be a warning plastered across the front of the bottle. I had a bad skin reaction to this product.
customer_reviews.author: Katina L.

customer_reviews.title: Smells weird
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited when I got this product in the mail. I personally don't like the smell. It's just kinda a weird scent that I can't describe but it does not smell fresh or clean or like eucalyptus! If it wouldve had a different smell then maybe I would but again because it does work pretty well but I just don't enjoy. I tried the lavender scent and that one is even worse!
customer_reviews.author: Kaela Pascarelli

customer_reviews.title: The smell is strong but nice
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried I wouldn't like the smell from some of the reviews but I really like it. It fills the whole house. I also use eucalyptus candles so it goes well.
customer_reviews.author: Kiana

customer_reviews.title: ... use this on towels in the washer it smells great, great for spraying on my couch to get ...
customer_reviews.text: I also use this on towels in the washer it smells great, great for spraying on my couch to get rid of dog odor is why i bought it, now i use it for cleaning floors, walls, bathroom, kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Best odor eliminator ever!
customer_reviews.text: Best odor eliminator ever! Great for the bathroom and pet areas. Its a disinfectant so i clean my whole house with this stuff. Smells so good.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: My son did puppy thing in his garage could not get smell out. This worked great, also I have a basement carpeted gets musty use this and works .
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Terry

customer_reviews.title: WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: This really works! I now use it to clean & freshen up around the house. It smells wonderful
customer_reviews.author: Wrathof_Kahn

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! Two dogs and a lot of kids—- spray n clean with this frequently!—- it eorks great on gym clothes — just add to the detergent in the washer!
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: This really works. I spayed inside my 10 yr old car and a few days later someone got in and said it smelled like a new car.
customer_reviews.author: Born to Shop

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS! And from a GREAT SELLER.
customer_reviews.text: I was so tickled to find this packaged deal for such a great price! OdoBan is one of my "go to's" us and has been forever! To have it delivered to my front door, and in no time was wonderful! Please don't stop selling it because I will be back.
customer_reviews.author: DebbieY

customer_reviews.title: Great to remove odors
customer_reviews.text: Fell in love with this product when I volunteered at the humane society. Great to use in the laundry to remove all kinds of odors. Was glad Amazon was able to ship to my location (took awhile to get in my cart to ship).
customer_reviews.author: MN1976

customer_reviews.title: It  DOES remove odors
customer_reviews.text: I totally recommend this spray for anyone with pets!!! I like the scent,it's not overpowering but DOES remove odors instantly. I spray on my trash, bathroom floors,kitchen,anyplace there's an odor to eliminate.
customer_reviews.author: nanalaurie

customer_reviews.title: I love Odoban!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love Odoban. It's pretty amazing stuff. I used it in my carpet steamer to get rid of a urine stain made by my dog. Odoban took care of the stain and the odor which was really strong. I use it to spray on my furniture occasionally instead of Febreeze. Smells much better and it kills germs and bacteria. Will definitely be keeping it in the house!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Pappas

customer_reviews.title: Odors come back
customer_reviews.text: While it does mask odors for a few days, they ultimately come back. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Katikat23

customer_reviews.title: Arrived busted up and leaked all over the place.
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived busted up and leaked all over. The place. There is no product left. When I clicked to try to return, it tells me it is not eligible for return. I want my money back!!
customer_reviews.author: jennifer knabb rago

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. Smells fresh and clean. I've added a small amount to the washer when I wash the blankets the dog and cats sleep on. A little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: otter

customer_reviews.title: cleaner, deodorizer, kills bacteria
customer_reviews.text: easy to use, very versatile, even use it if foul smelling laundry. Its gentle on surfaces---a very good product
customer_reviews.author: Larry Baxley

customer_reviews.title: Household staple now
customer_reviews.text: Works just like it says on the bottle. I use it all around my house. Have purchased multiple times and keep it at home always for everything smelly.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: OK but not not a great value
customer_reviews.text: Was hoping this would work better for odor elimination but I was disappointed. Honestly, simple green works just as good and is a better value for your money. Not much more to say.
customer_reviews.author: really_tall_guy

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This is a must with pets. It completely eliminates odors when used to clean surfaces your pets eliminate on.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Currier

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product
customer_reviews.text: We have 5 dogs so I really needed a product to keep our carpet from smelling like we have 5 dogs. This works great and the scent is pleasant and not overpowering.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth V

customer_reviews.title: It smells so clean
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great if you have pets , i use the spray bottle for small cleanups and the gallon bottle i mix with water and use in my rug shampooer. It really smells clean id recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly A.

customer_reviews.title: It DOES eliminate odor
customer_reviews.text: My kids moved out and in there bedroom they had 4 rats and a hedgehog. I tried every kind of carpet cleaner to try and get the smell out and nothing worked!! Odoban DID WORK!! I am so very happy and the smell is wonderful! I don't know how it worked but THANK YOU!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nicolle Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Worth every cent!
customer_reviews.text: Use it for the laundry dog beds, pads etc... Use as a spray for outside kennels. Great stuff for eliminating odors
customer_reviews.author: hillside

customer_reviews.title: three old ladies
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful stuff.. I have two old Bassets, one was a rescue who had been bred out, so she "drips." My wood floors don't smell after being cleaned with OdoBan, their bedding stays fresh smelling after it has been washed and dried and I am not embarrassed when folks drop by my house. It smells like a people house not a dog house now. Part of spring cleaning will include wet mopping my open porches with OdoBan since I also feed feral cats there. I like this stuff!!
customer_reviews.author: Me Meaux

customer_reviews.title: I'm amazed!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to eliminate the smoke smell from the car. I only had to spray down the inside once, and all odors were gone. Best of all, the odors have stayed gone!
customer_reviews.author: Lmb14

product_meta.title: OdoBan Ready-to-Use 32 oz Spray Bottle and 1 Gal Concentrate, Lavender Scent - Odor Eliminator, Disinfectant, Flood Fire Water Damage Restoration
product_meta.description: Style:LavenderOdoBan, odor eliminator, cleans, disinfects, sanitizes and deodorizes precleaned hard, nonporous household surfaces. OdoBan eliminates unpleasant odors on washable surfaces such as upholstery, carpets, bedding, showers, walls and floors while leaving a fresh scent. This industrial liquid odor eliminator leaves no residue and has a variety of uses.
feature_bullets: Includes one (1) 32Oz ready-to-use spray bottle and 1 gal of concentrate, lavender scent
OdoBan, odor eliminator and disinfectant, eliminates unpleasant odors, cleans, disinfects, sanitizes and deodorizes household surfaces while leaving a fresh scent
This industrial liquid odor eliminator leaves no residue and has a variety of uses
Multipurpose cleaner; kills viruses in 60 seconds; kills 99.99 percent of germs in 60 seconds
Excellent for flood and fire restoration and water damage
